bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with mian pao 面皰 , facial blister. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 27: 面皰者，謂 面上有風熱氣生皰 , “Facial blister is to say: blisters developing in the face following exposure to wind and heat qi”.

b) Of chuang 瘡 , sores developing in the shape of water blisters on the skin following some injury. The external skin is rather thin. Its contents mostly resemble water or pus. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry bo pi 檗皮 : 主 熱瘡皰起，蟲瘡 , “It controls heat sores with the rise of blisters , and bug sores”.
